declarations.description: Simple class for efficient HTML string building
declarations.name: HTMLBuilder

members.description: Adds a string to the builder

members.name: toHTML
members.description: Returns the built-up string, optionally using the given container for enclosing.

cssProperties.name: --drawer-max-height

cssProperties.name: --drawer-min-height

members.name: open
members.description: Controls whether the drawer is open or closed

members.name: position
members.description: Position of the drawer relative to the viewport

members.name: maxHeight
members.description: Maximum height for top/bottom positioned drawers (CSS value)

members.name: minHeight
members.description: Minimum height for top/bottom positioned drawers (CSS value)

members.name: showClose
members.description: Whether to show the close button in the header

members.name: show

type.text:
@param {any|HTMLElement|string} [options.header] - Header content
   * @param {"bottom"|"top"|"left"|"right"} [options.position] - Drawer position
   * @param {string} [options.maxHeight] - Maximum height (CSS value)
   * @param {string} [options.minHeight] - Minimum height (CSS value)
   * @param {boolean} [options.showClose] - Show close button
   * @param {boolean} [options.waitForMedia=true] - Wait for images/videos to load
   * @param {number} [options.mediaTimeout=500] - Media load timeout in ms
   *

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Accessible label for the icon (adds role="img")

declarations.description:
<pds-jsonform>

Form Actions:
By default, the form includes Submit and Reset buttons inside the <form> element.

Usage options:
1. Default buttons:
   <pds-jsonform .jsonSchema=${schema}></pds-jsonform>

2. Customize labels:
   <pds-jsonform .jsonSchema=${schema} submit-label="Save" reset-label="Clear"></pds-jsonform>

3. Hide reset button:
   <pds-jsonform .jsonSchema=${schema} hide-reset></pds-jsonform>

4. Add extra buttons (slot):
   <pds-jsonform .jsonSchema=${schema}>
     <button type="button" slot="actions"
declarations.name: SchemaForm

attributes.description: Unique identifier for the panel (auto-generated if not provided)

cssProperties.name: --color-accent-400

attributes.name: label

slots.description: Toast messages are dynamically added to the shadow DOM

type.text:
@param {"information"|"success"|"warning"|"error"} [options.type="information"] - Toast type
   * @param {number} [options.duration] - Duration in ms (auto-calculated if not provided)
   * @param {boolean} [options.closable=true] - Whether toast can be closed manually
   * @param {boolean} [options.persistent=false] - If true, toast doesn't auto-dismiss
   *

parameters.name: toastId
parameters.description: The ID of the toast to dismiss
